name: Super-B
description:
This is Super Ball game.

Swipe your finger up or down to throw balls and break bricks!
The angle is key point!
This is a simple but addictive arkanoid game.
When brick breaks, get the ball and items.
As balls are stacked by getting ball with the racket, the number of balls to shoot is increasing.

- Use 8 balls for various power,speed and size.
- shoot bricks when receiving shoot items such as star and circle shape block.
- Use bomb which breaks all block and shape around bomb.
- Challenge your friends with leader board.
